content.raw:
Could you do a before \(default\) and after \(this branch\) comparison to quantify the change?

Here are a couple of examples where we were able to find problems with usage or verify that it wasn’t a significant change to the computational usage:

[#!/osrf/vrx/pull-requests/122/issue-94-buoyancy/diff](#!/osrf/vrx/pull-requests/122/issue-94-buoyancy/diff)

[#!/osrf/vrx/pull-requests/114/wave-visual-physics-refactor/diff](#!/osrf/vrx/pull-requests/114/wave-visual-physics-refactor/diff)

My sense is that this won’t be a problem, but it would be good to verify.
